title: MBMBaM 505: Slippery When Voltron
description:
In today’s episode, we set a new record for Lack of Commitment to an Opening Bit — a record whose previous holders include … let’s see here … oh, it’s us! The list just says us, like, fifty times.

Suggested talking points: Hot Gin, Sonic’s Sacrifice, Timesheet Secrets, Bathroom Investigations, Goldfish Punishment, Large Old Pizza News, Titanic Kaiju
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
